title: How to set a password with at least one upper case and one lower case letter and a special character - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, first pull up your keyboard! Youn don't want to make the password easy for someone to hack. But, at the same time, you want it to be something you'll remember. For example, how about H2aniF01a9H! (Hanifah 2019! Get it?)!
